description:

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Please revert the builder changes; then LGTM.

Andrew is working on the builder already; I suspect
he's already got those fixes in a pending CL.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=7b819318c606 ***

cmd/goinstall: remove now that 'go get' works

The changes to builder were not tested.
